entries.title: ‘Among Us’-like game ‘Goose Goose Duck’ tops Steam charts thanks to BTS
entries.description: The indie social deduction game saw a surge in popularity after V from the K-pop group BTS played it on a live stream.

entries.title: PlayStation 5 shortage over, announces Sony exec Jim Ryan
entries.description: Sony Interactive Entertainment president Jim Ryan said it will be easier to get a PlayStation 5 at the 2023 CES.

entries.title: Smart homes can be dumb. Here’s how to do it the right way.
entries.description: A smart home skeptic and a smart home maximalist square off on which internet-connected home gadgets are useful, which aren't and how to know the difference.

entries.title: This small box could be the future of building in outer space
entries.description: MIT scientists built a microwave-sized box that could let astronauts build parts in space that can’t be made on Earth.

entries.title: WhatsApp adds feature to bypass internet censors in repressive regimes
entries.description: Users can now access WhatsApp via proxy servers, helping them evade governments in Iran and elsewhere that have tightened internet controls.
